pattern.name: Segment comparison
pattern.description:
Value of the numerical field divided by a statistic (MEAN, PERCENTILE) of the nominal field. Useful to be used in composition with pattern parent field or parent from hierarchical lookup.
select Key , Ratio(Field, Y) from Table t left join (select Segmentor, Y = Statistic(Field) from Table where Filter group by Segmentor) s on t.Segmentor=s.Segmentor
Warning: Data leakage happens as all @baseId are used to calculate the average while only training samples should be used. If you have a lot of samples, balanced classes and no outliers the practical effect of data leakage should be minimal. But beware of extreme scenarios!
This pattern is producing great predictors with reasonable speed.
pattern.author: Filip Trojan
pattern.code: SELECT @base , CASE WHEN Y IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN Y=0 THEN -9999 ELSE @numericalColumn/Y END AS @columnName FROM @propagatedTable a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT @nominalColumn, avg(@numericalColumn) AS Y FROM @propagatedTable GROUP BY @nominalColumn) b ON a.@nominalColumn = b.@nominalColumn
